title: Drawing, "Callipoe drawn by two horses; two masked figures right, one holding a tambourine the other a triangle. Yellow background drapery at left."
medium: Brush and watercolors, pen and ink on paper
description: Costume design sketch for the circus.  Callipoe drawn by two horses; two masked figures right, one holding a tambourine the other a triangle. Yellow background drapery at left.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Callipoe drawn by two horses; two masked figures right, one holding a tambourine the other a triangle. Yellow background drapery at left.". Brush and watercolors, pen and ink on paper. 1971-4-13.
